item.title: weekly picks (Mar 1 week 2025)
item.description:
A WordCloud of 2025 Mar 1st week collection

===This week’s pick===

Score : 13545

  1. 2503.00484v1 Magnetic order and spin dynamics across the ferromagnetic quantum critical point in Ni_1-xMo_x (arXiv)

  1. acsnano.4c18592 Modulating Nanometric Spin Spiral States via Spontaneous Lattice Distortion in a Short Period Helimagnet MnCoSi (ACS Nano)
